Q0: Long QT syndrome (LQTS) gene panel testing
Q17: To submit the claim, ensure the following steps are followed: 1) Confirm the test was ordered by an approved specialist (e.g., pediatric cardiologist); 2) Document that the patient meets all medical necessity criteria, including clinical features (QTc ≥ 482ms, syncope, family history of sudden cardiac death), and that acquired causes have been ruled out; 3) Include documentation of genetic counseling; 4) Use the appropriate CPT code (e.g., 0237U, 81413, or 81414); 5) Attach all relevant clinical notes and ECG reports; 6) If required by the plan, obtain prior authorization; 7) Submit the claim to Aetna with all supporting documentation.
